cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent the CU from starting properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration failures and potential runtime errors in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid_level'，會導致日誌配置失敗，並在 DU 中造成潛在的運行時錯誤。
